name: omgosc
readme:
OMG OSC is an OSC implementation in JavaScript, using the UDP protocol libraries
from NodeJS, and the ArrayBuffer implementation for type conversions.  It was
written for use in Plask (www.plask.org), but is applicable elsewhere.

(c) Dean McNamee <dean@gmail.com>, 2011.
